content:
Scenario: Teen climate activism recognized as care for future generations
    Given Jasmine participates in climate action organizing
    And she attends climate strikes and advocates for environmental policy
    When bioregional_elohim tracks her environmental engagement
    Then it should recognize climate activism as care work
    And value her labor for intergenerational justice
    And understand that fighting for climate action is care for future
    And track civic environmental engagement alongside other care contributions
    And demonstrate that ecological advocacy is essential care economy work
    And support her generation's environmental leadership
